snippet.title: Rusty Flesh Announcement Trailer | Sci-fi Horror Puzzle Platformer for the Game Boy Color (2025)
snippet.description:
Rusty Flesh is an upcoming sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping (guess you could call it a VVVVVV-like!). Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

Rusty Flesh will be released in 2025, but you can wishlist it now!

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2962940/Rusty_Flesh/
- Itch.io: https://wasteland-gms.itch.io/rusty-flesh
